projects.title: Quotes
projects.description: In various social circles, you have quotes people said that you want to keep track of. Now you can! On this website you can create an account in order to upload your collection of quotes and share these.

projects.title: Domsquare time trap
projects.description: As my thesis in high school I followed a course on the University of Utrecht. Our task was to design an IT solution in order to educate the user on the history of the dom square. Here I collaborated on a team of developers, historians, and liberal arts students

projects.title: Scrabble
projects.description: As a project for bit module 02 we created a TUI version of Scrabble in  Java.
